html:
mine outcasts [of Moab] dwell with thee. The appeal of the Moabites continues.

extortioner is at an end/spoiler ceaseth/oppressors are consumed. Isa. 16:4-5 is a messianic prophecy. The newly restored kingdom of David removes oppression and destruction; the Messiah sits on the throne (16:5), a symbol of kingship.
